description:
{"blocks":[{"key":"96dpr","text":"This protocol details an Agrobacterium-mediated genetic transformation 
method for the fungal plant pathogen Diplodia sapinea. The technique 
results in high rates of homologous integration, enabling both targeted 
mutagenesis and heterologous gene expression.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":25,"length":13},{"style":"italic","offset":109,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: Diplodia sapinea,Diplodia tip blight,Sphaeropsis sapinea,Agrobacterium-mediated-transformation,homologous integration,genetic transformation,ATMT

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Transformation of electrocompetent Agrobacterium sp. AGL-1cells with plasmid DNA by electroporation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bo88a","text":"Thaw electrocompetent cells on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transformation of electrocompetent Agrobacterium sp. AGL-1cells with plasmid DNA by electroporation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5td22","text":"Add 1 - 1.5 µl of plasmid DNA to 50 µl of cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transformation of electrocompetent Agrobacterium sp. AGL-1cells with plasmid DNA by electroporation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2olfa","text":"Incubate on ice for 2 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transformation of electrocompetent Agrobacterium sp. AGL-1cells with plasmid DNA by electroporation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ebr0o","text":"Transfer the cell-DNA mixture to a chilled electroporation cuvette (2 mm) without introducing bubbles. Flick the cuvette downward quickly to distribute cells across the bottom of the well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transformation of electrocompetent Agrobacterium sp. AGL-1cells with plasmid DNA by electroporation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4iggp","text":"Electroporate the mixture with the following settings: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"blrtb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"farju","text":"Voltage: 2500 V","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3cd51","text":"Capacitance: 25 µF","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c57ld","text":"Resistance: 400 Ω","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transformation of electrocompetent Agrobacterium sp. AGL-1cells with plasmid DNA by electroporation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"55t51","text":"Add 1 ml of LB medium to the cuvette immediately after pulsing and gently pipette up and down to resuspend the cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transformation of electrocompetent Agrobacterium sp. AGL-1cells with plasmid DNA by electroporation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f38fe","text":"Transfer the cell suspension to a reagent tube and incubate the culture:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1arvl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1jqa","text":"28 – 30°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"56ibj","text":"250 rpm","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1b3q7","text":"3 h","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transformation of electrocompetent Agrobacterium sp. AGL-1cells with plasmid DNA by electroporation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"154tg","text":"Spread the cells (10 µl, 100 µl, rest) onto selective plates with following selection markers:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cnv63","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"922sn","text":"50 µg/ml Kanamycin (10 µl stock / 10 ml medium)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bkoqu","text":"25 µg/ml Rifampicin (5 µl stock / 10 ml medium)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"12v4q","text":"100 µg/ml Carbenicillin (10 µl stock / 10 ml medium)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transformation of electrocompetent Agrobacterium sp. AGL-1cells with plasmid DNA by electroporation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8jddt","text":"Incubate at 28 – 30°C. Transformed colonies are visible after 24-72 h.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transformation of electrocompetent Agrobacterium sp. AGL-1cells with plasmid DNA by electroporation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ehg1b","text":"Prepare a glycerin stock from several colonies and check via colony-PCR or plasmid preparation and PCR if your strains contain the expected fragment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5p0fu","text":"Inoculate LB plates (10 ml) containing the following selection markers with Agrobacterium sp. AGL-1 from the glycerin stock. Use the untransformed strain as a negative control. Incubate at 28°C for about 2 days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":76,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4d13c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9vur4","text":"AGL1 transformed: 50 µg/ml Kanamycin (10 µl stock / 10 ml medium), 25 µg/ml Rifampicin (5 µl stock / 10 ml medium), 100 µg/ml Carbenicillin (10 µl stock / 10 ml medium)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9uuns","text":"        \nAGL1 untransformed: 25 µg/ml Rifampicin (5 µl stock / 10 ml medium), 100 µg/ml Carbenicillin (10 µl stock / 10 ml medium)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1tkg4","text":"Inoculate 25 ml of liquid LB with the following selection markers in a 250 ml flask with a colony from fresh plates:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f8n64","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a1nqq","text":"AGL1 transformed: 50 µg/ml Kanamycin (25 µl stock / 25 ml medium)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3drvs","text":"        \nAGL1 untransformed: 25 µg/ml Rifampicin (12,5 µl stock / 25 ml medium)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ff6m","text":"Incubate until the cultures reached an OD600nm of 0.5 to 0.9:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":41,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4sveo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1tcv1","text":"200 rpm","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5gnoj","text":"28°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b48pf","text":"~ 22 h","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7t6cs","text":"      \nTransfer 12-15 ml of the Agrobacterium sp. AGL-1 suspension to a 50 ml centrifuge tube and centrifuge at: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"duv65","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4c5n4","text":"3500 rpm","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6sju1","text":"10 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b24p1","text":"Wash the pellet with 1 ml freshly made liquid IM (see table, 100 ml Medium + 100 µl AS + 4 ml MES buffer) and centrifuge at:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2hjkj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bja6l","text":"3500 rpm","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"44ad","text":"10 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"404us","text":"Resuspend the pellet in liquid IM to an OD600nm of about 0.3.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":42,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"508ms","text":"Incubate ca. 25 ml until the OD600 is doubled (about 0.6 – 0.8) in a 250 ml Erlenmeyer flask.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":31,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5lu1v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46d6h","text":"28°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"86psq","text":"200 rpm","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4uq01","text":"8 - 10 h","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2aum1","text":"Harvest spores of D. sapinea by rinsing the plate with 0.01 % Tween (Incubated on VMM, 21 d, constant light, 5000 – 7000 Lux)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":18,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3ft1v","text":"Centrifuge spores for 10 s at 5000 rpm, discard supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9d1in","text":"Wash spores twice with 1 - 2 ml liquid IM and centrifuge at:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cc80p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"acgf2","text":"5000 rpm","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"821qi","text":"10 s ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"egeu8","text":"Resuspend cells in IM to a concentration of 2 · 106 spores/ml. 50 µl suspension is needed per transformation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":50,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"u0qm","text":"Add ca. 5 ml selection medium per plate (freshly made or made a few days before).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6v7of","text":"Selection medium:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6s9qd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1hna6","text":"VMM + 300 µM Cefotaxim (150 µl in 50 ml) +10 µg/ml Hygromycin B (10 µl in 100 ml)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d4uqk","text":"Incubate at:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eojvc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jduh","text":"28°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dg8b3","text":"1 - 2 weeks","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"egcsf","text":"darkness","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4oapo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"91dj","text":"Pick fungal colonies that grow through the selection medium and transfer them onto new selection plates (VMM + 10 µg/ml Hygromycin B (10 µl in 100 ml)). Verify successful transformation by PCR.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7sg9g","text":"Mix 50 µl of the spore suspension and 50 µl of the Agrobacterium sp. AGL-1 culture and 20 µl IM per transformation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":51,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5i6i9","text":"Onto 5.5 cm IM plates (freshly made or made the day before, ca. 5 ml medium per plate; stored in darkness at 4°C) place a nitrocellulose filter (MF-Millipore™ HAWP03700) with sterile tweezers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fj6im","text":"Pipette 110 µl of the mixture onto the filter and spread by tilting the plate. Ensure that the suspension does not run off the filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"73sfc","text":"Incubate at:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3o04n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qqpv","text":"22°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dt96p","text":"upside down","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"74kqm","text":"in darkness","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4v12","text":"3 days","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21roc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Agrobacterium-mediated transformation of Diplodia sapinea
